name: Zoltan's Idea
description:
This game is our submission for Ludum Dare 44, theme "Your Life Is Your Currency".
We really wanted to make everything from scratch and we did the impossible to produce every asset and code in these 3 days, even if this is a jam.
We were a bit scared by the theme at first but then we were much more scared when we met Zoltan!

Team:

@tommyflower: graphics + code
@fanu : code
@ioleoso: music

We used Unity, Photoshop and AfterEffects.

Recommended resolution 16:10

(Note 1 in Italy, where we are from, cats have 7 souls, not nine. Still a lot :) )

Note on video: if you have trouble watching the intro video after the splash (Debian maybe),
just click and it will start. If you still have trouble watch the intro here:

want some spoiler?
Watch the gameplay.
But come on! Since you are here why don't you play it! it's more fun! :)
